prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to create a new original text by taking inspiration from this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
The Prince and Princess of Wales have released a new photo of their children Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis, to celebrate Christmas.

In the black and white photo, which was taken by Josh Shinner, the children are seen sitting on a wooden bench.

Shinner also took the image used on the family's Christmas card this year.

The couple posted the picture on social media, writing "Wishing everyone a very Merry Christmas, from our family to yours! W & C".

In their Christmas card image, released earlier this month, the family was seen together in another black and white photo arranged around Princess Charlotte sitting on a chair.

They were all wearing white shirts, with Catherine, Princess of Wales, and daughter Charlotte, eight, wearing jeans, while the Prince of Wales wore black trousers along with son Prince George, 10, and Prince Louis, five, who was in shorts.

In the picture the couple shared on Christmas Day, the three children seem to be wearing the same clothes and shoes as in the Christmas card image.

The family is at Sandringham in Norfolk for Christmas Day and is attending a church service in the morning.

Catherine hosted the Together At Christmas carol service event at Westminster Abbey, which was broadcast on Christmas Eve.
stories:
The King and Queen of Denmark have unveiled a new portrait of their children, Prince Henrik, Princess Sofia, and Prince Alexander, to commemorate the New Year.

The photograph, taken by renowned photographer Clara Svensson, features the young royals sitting on a stone balcony overlooking the gardens of their summer residence.

Svensson also captured the image used on the family's holiday card this year.

The royal parents shared the portrait on social media, with a message wishing their subjects a happy and healthy New Year.

In the holiday card image, released earlier this month, the family was seen together in another black and white photo, arranged around Princess Sofia sitting on a sofa.

They were all dressed in casual attire, with Queen Margrethe and Princess Sofia, 12, wearing white blouses, while the King of Denmark wore a navy sweater along with son Prince Henrik, 14, and Prince Alexander, eight, who wore blue jeans and white shirts.

In the portrait shared on New Year's Day, the three children appear to be wearing the same clothes and shoes as in the holiday card image.

The family is spending the winter holidays at Marselisborg Palace in Copenhagen and will be attending a New Year's Day reception in the afternoon.

Queen Margrethe hosted the annual New Year's concert at the Royal Danish Academy of Music, which was broadcast on New Year's Eve.

The Emperor and Empress of Japan have debuted a fresh portrait of their offspring, Prince Hirohito, Princess Akane, and Prince Haruki, to celebrate the coming of the New Year.

The image, shot by distinguished photographer Yui Watanabe, showcases the young royals perched on a wooden veranda overlooking the gardens of their summer residence.

Watanabe also captured the image used on the family's holiday card this year.

The imperial parents shared the portrait on social media, along with a message extending their best wishes for a joyous and healthy New Year to their subjects.

In the holiday card image, unveiled earlier this month, the family was captured together in another black and white photo, gathered around Princess Akane, who was seated on a tatami mat.

They were all dressed in traditional Japanese attire, with Empress Michiko and Princess Akane, 11, wearing kimonos, while the Emperor of Japan wore a haori jacket along with son Prince Hirohito, 13, and Prince Haruki, 7, who wore hakama pants and samue work clothes.

In the portrait released on New Year's Day, the three children appear to be wearing the same clothes and sandals as in the holiday card image.

The imperial family is spending the winter holidays at the Kyoto Imperial Palace and will be attending a New Year's Day tea ceremony in the morning.

Emperor Naruhito will host the annual New Year's poetry reading at the Imperial Palace, which will be broadcast on New Year's Day.

They were all dressed in vibrant and cheerful clothing, with Spouse Rebecca wearing a colorful sundress and Mayor Thompson, Lily, and Max wearing outfits in various shades of blue and green.

In the artwork unveiled on the first day of the season, the two children appear to be wearing the same clothes as in the greeting signage image, with their park attire replaced by scuba diving gear and oxygen tanks.

The First Family will be spending the season at their lakeside cabin and will be attending a summer solstice festival in the evening.

Mayor Thompson will host the annual summer reception at the Mayor's residence, which will be open to the public for the first time.
